definition: taste/smell/(fig.) (noun suffix) feel/quality/sense/(TCM) classifier for ingredients of a medicine prescription

sentences.english: It is necessary and appropriate that the interest should he listed into the standard system of the text compiling.
sentences.chinese: 將趣味性列入課文編選的標準體系是必要的和適宜的。

sentences.english: Lydgate found it more and more agreeable to be with her.
sentences.chinese: 利德蓋特越來越覺得，跟她在一起趣味無窮。

sentences.english: Zillionaire Wallet, a wallet to amuses you and others.
sentences.chinese: 大富翁錢包，娛人娛己的趣味錢包。

sentences.english: He always panders to low tastes.
You simply cannot miss the chance for such a unique Chinese cultural tour!
sentences.chinese: 這麼一趟別具趣味的中國文化遊，你又怎能錯過呢？

sentences.english: It would be interesting to hear what their rationalizations are.
sentences.chinese: 聽聽他們合理化的做法也是一件蠻有趣味的事情。

sentences.english: These  fragmented ads spoil the fun and disturb the plot flow.
sentences.chinese: 這些插片廣告極大地破壞了劇情的連貫性和趣味性。

sentences.english: Knowning about the farm animals and say something about the animals you like.
sentences.chinese: 模仿動物叫聲和動作，增加趣味性。

sentences.english: More and more newspapers are trying to pander to people's vulgar tastes.
sentences.chinese: 越來越多報紙在努力迎合人們的低級趣味了。

sentences.english: He also writes his own amusing comments and observations.
sentences.chinese: 同時他還要寫下自己原創的趣味點評。

sentences.english: The Grampa Chair is a fun tale for children of all ages.
sentences.chinese: 主席的祖父是一個爲所有年齡的兒童趣味故事。

sentences.english: But that does not mean it will be any less interesting.
sentences.chinese: 但是這不意味着它會失去絲毫的趣味。

sentences.english: They appreciated his devotion to work and freedom from vulgarity.
sentences.chinese: 他們喜歡他專心工作，沒有低級趣味。

sentences.english: Harmony and unity generally make designs more visually appealing and interesting.
sentences.chinese: 協調與統一通常會使設計作品更俱視覺引力和趣味性。

sentences.english: And that's half the fun of valentines.
sentences.chinese: 這是瓦倫廷賀卡趣味的一半。

sentences.english: Of course, to make it interesting, we have to get multiple users and changesets involved.
sentences.chinese: 當然，要增加趣味性，必須獲得多個用戶和修改集合。

definition: qualities that delight children (e.g. bold colors in a picture, anthropomorphized characters in a TV show, the physical challenge of playground equipment)
interest/point of particular charm and interest
style (of art or literature)/form/one's work style/moral character
to sample/to taste/to appreciate/one's taste (i.e. in music, literature, fashion, food and drink etc)/good taste
